titleStmt.title: A sober reply to a serious enquiry. Or, An answer to a reformed Quaker in vindication of himself, Mr. G. Keith and others, for their conformity to the Church of England, against what I have written on that subject. By Trepidantium Malleus.
titleStmt.author: Trepidantium Malleus.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed, and sold by A. Baldwin, and John Marshall,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
